title: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrect documentation
description: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrectly states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
OB: The documentation in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting, but the actual behavior does not reflect this claim.
EB: The documentation should accurately describe that custom cookie name does not affect URL rewriting.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Go to the Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 section in the documentation.
2. Read the statement regarding the custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting.
3. Compare the provided behavior with the expected behavior.
